name: Upgrade your React SPA app to Next.js
description: July's presentation will cover how to upgrade a React app to Next.js. We will be using a video app using Mux for the demo. Join us at our next JaxNode event where we will explore the latest advancements in JavaScript frameworks. Dive deep into how frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue can revolutionize your web development projects. Our expert speakers will guide you through best practices in utilizing these powerful tools to enhance user experiences and streamline development processes. Whether you are a seasoned developer or just starting out, this event is a great opportunity to expand your knowledge and network with like-minded individuals. Don't miss out on this engaging session that promises to inspire and empower you in the world of JavaScript frameworks.
